entry.tran: 调查官；巡视官；申诉专员
entry.def: The ombudsman is an independent official who has been appointed to investigate complaints that people make against the government or public organizations.

example.ex: The leaflet explains how to complain to the banking ombudsman.
example.tran: 这份传单介绍了如何向银行意见调查官投诉。

means.word_mean: 1. a government appointee who investigates complaints by private persons against the government
